A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ok\, its not Empire\, but expecting it to be Empire was extremely foolish\, this had way too much hype to live up to. It was a good movie\, and while parts of it end up being unnecessary\, it still holds up well. So many people are saying things like \"worst star wars movie everrrrrr\" well clearly they did not watch the prequels\, nor did they even watch Return of the Jedi. Porgs are not as bad as ewoks\, and none of the somewhat silly scenes compare in any way to the menace that was jar jar. I have to back up the critics on this one\, which is something that I normally would not do.
